attributes.action: Launch a full public inquiry on the governments handling of COVID-19 in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We need to hold the government to account for its actions that either have or haven't taken place during the handling of the crisis. We need to know what steps worked and perhaps more importantly what didn't so we can learn from our mistakes and prevent something like this ever happening again
attributes.background: Once the effects of COVID-19 have been resolved Parliament should authorise a full independent public enquiry into the government's handling of the crisis, the actions taken or not taken and the reasons for these decisions.
